title: Bug 19079[FastView] Open a new view  As fast view preference only works when there is no placeholder
description: Bug 19079[FastView] Open a new viewAs fast view preference only works when there is no placeholder Build F2.1.
OB: Show ViewCVS Repositories, gets put on shortcut bar as fast view.5. Show ViewSearch, does not get put on shortcut bar as fast view.
SR: Close all Perspectives.2. Open a Java Perspective.3. Go to PreferencesPerspectivesOpen a new viewAs Fast View.4. Show ViewCVS Repositories, gets put on shortcut bar as fast view.5.
